ISSUE.TITLE: now rm $(now ls)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It would be nice if `now ls` could return only deployment ids if there's no tty, to let us pipe the result to another. Just like in docker we can do `docker rm $(docker ps -aq)`. In now, it could be `now rm $(now ls)` Or explicitly tell silent mode `-s`, `now rm $(now ls -q)`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-node] Change PATH to use node10 (#637) * [now-node] Change PATH to use node10 * Fallback to node8
